name: Kamran Ahmed Kanon
subquote: Love art. Itll make you feel alive
bio: Kamran Ahmed Kanon is a visual artist based in Dhaka, Bangladesh. He is a self-taught artist who has been working in the field of art for the last 10 years. He has a passion for creating art that is both visually appealing and thought-provoking. His work is inspired by nature, culture, and everyday life. He uses a variety of mediums including oil, acrylic, watercolor, and digital art. Kamran's work has been exhibited in various galleries and art shows in Bangladesh and abroad. He is also a member of the Bangladesh Shilpakala Academy and the Bangladesh Poribesh Andolon.
